product_highlights: Oat, soy, glucomannan, ginseng based ingredients
notes: BiotechBeauty is a US-based cosmetic ingredient company specializing in prebiotics, probiotics, and postbiotics with a strong focus on science-backed formulations. Their ingredient portfolio includes oat-based prebiotics, soy fermentation products, glucomannan prebiotics, and ginseng ferments. BiotechBeauty emphasizes education and scientific validation, providing comprehensive resources on microbiome science for formulators. Their innovative approach combines traditional ingredients like oat and soy with modern fermentation technology to create effective microbiome-friendly actives. Suitable for brands seeking scientifically-validated, natural microbiome ingredients.
